ing: 6 grape tomatoes, halved - or more to taste
des: "A simple salad for any time of year!"
ins: Place kale in a salad bowl and add yogurt. Use your hands to rub kale and yogurt together to reduce bitterness, 2 to 3 minutes. Stir grape tomatoes and cucumber into kale mixture and top salad with crumbled feta cheese and sunflower seeds.
